attributes.action: Treble Foreign Aid and send aid to the countries most in need.
attributes.additional_details: The world expects leadership and we should be able to give it.
attributes.background: Act more swiftly than ever before to save the world from escalating Coronavirus sharing the UK's experience.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want the Government to increase foreign aid, but it's not clear if you want this to focus on the international response to Covid-19, or be much broader.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not reduce the overseas aid budget (from 0.7% GDP): https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561068

Donate oxygen and intensive care medicines to countries in need: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584058

Send excess equipment to countries in humanitarian covid crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584188

Donate surplus Covid-19 vaccine doses to poorer countries: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565462

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
